name: LoungeflyMarvel: Falcon Cosplay Mini-rugzak - Merchoid Nederland
description: Are you feeling the need for speed? Want to channel your inner superhero and soar through the city streets like Iron Man? Well, we can't promise you a pair of wings, but we can offer you the next best thing - our Falcon-inspired mini backpack!Crafted from the finest faux leather, this backpack has been designed with the ultimate Marvel fan in mind. With its sleek black finish and striking applique and deboss printed details, you'll feel like you've just stepped out of Avengers HQ and onto the city streets. Whether you're heading to work, school, or simply out and about, this backpack is the perfect accessory to take your outfit to soaring new heights.But it's not just about looks - this mini backpack is also practical and functional. Measuring W 9"" X H 10.5"" X D 4.5"", it's just the right size to carry your everyday essentials without weighing you down. And with its comfortable straps and easy-to-carry top handle, you can take it with you wherever you go - whether you're facing off against Thanos, or simply taking on the daily commute.So why wait? Whether you're a die-hard Marvel fan, or just looking for a stylish and practical backpack to add to your collection, our Falcon-inspired mini backpack is the perfect choice. Grab yours today, and get ready to take flight like never before! - Faux leather material for a luxurious feel- Applique and deboss printed details for an eye-catching look- Perfect size for everyday use at W 9"" X H 10.5"" X D 4.5""- Comfortable straps and top handle for easy carrying- Ideal for Marvel fans or anyone looking for a stylish and practical backpackProduct DetailsProduct type: Mini BackpackLicense: MarvelManufacturer: LoungeflySpecificaties Gewicht: Ongeveer 750 gram (26 ounces) Land van herkomst: China Materialen: Kunstleer (polyurethaan) SKU: MVBK0139GTIN: 671803346758
